00083 void catchterminate(int sig)
00084 {
00085   sigterminate = 1;
00086   fprintf(stderr, "... catched signal - terminate minimization\n");
00087   signal(sig, catchterminate);

00138 #define M_2PI (2*M_PI)
00139 #define M_PI2 (M_PI*M_PI)
00140 
00141 inline static double dabs(double x) { if (x<0) return -x; else return x; };
00142 
00143 #ifdef ORIENTED
00144 static double lalpha0;
00145 static double lbeta0;
00146 static double lgamma0;
00147 
00148 inline static double mod2pi(double a) { return (a - floor(a/M_2PI)*M_2PI); }
00149 
00150 inline static double diffang(double a, double b)
00151 {
00152   return (M_PI - dabs(M_PI-mod2pi(a-b)));
00153 }
00154 
00155 int orientationinverted(double alpha, double beta, double gamma,
00156                         double lalpha, double lbeta, double lgamma)
00157 {
00158   // if we are away from beta = pi/2 only look at beta
00159   // if we are close to beta = pi/2 also look at alpha
00160   if ((diffang(beta, M_PI_2) > 0.1 && 
00161        diffang(M_PI-beta, lbeta) < diffang(beta, lbeta)) ||
00162       (diffang(beta, M_PI_2) <= 0.1 && 
00163        diffang(M_PI-beta, lbeta)+diffang(alpha-M_PI, lalpha) < 
00164        diffang(beta, lbeta)+diffang(alpha, lalpha)))
00165     return 1;
00166   else
00167     return 0;
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 void invertangles(double* alpha, double* beta, double* gamma)
00172 {
00173   *alpha = mod2pi(*alpha - M_PI);
00174   *beta  = M_PI - *beta;
00175   *gamma = mod2pi(M_PI - *gamma);
00176 }
00177 #endif

00179 
00180 static complex double expect(int n, complex double* A, complex double* c)
00181 {
00182   int i,j;
00183   complex double res = 0.0;
00184 
00185   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00186     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00187       res += conj(c[i])*A[i+j*n]*c[j];
00188 
00189   return res;
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 static void gradexpect(int n, gradSlaterDet* dA, complex double* c,
00194                        gradSlaterDet* da)
00195 {
00196   int i,j;
00197 
00198   zerogradSlaterDet(da);
00199 
00200   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00201     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00202       addmulttogradSlaterDet(da, &dA[i+j*n], conj(c[i])*c[j]);
00203 }

00205 
00206 // perform K-mixing calculation and sort out "good" states
00207 
00208 static int cmpmerit(void* ap, void* bp) 
00209 {
00210   double a=*(double*) ap;
00211   double b=*(double*) bp;
00212   
00213   return (a<=b ? (a<b ? 1 : 0) : -1);
00214 }
00215 
00216 
00217 void kmixingstates(complex double* H, complex double* N, int j, double thresh, 
00218                    double* egood, complex double* Vgood, int* ngood)
00219 {
00220   complex double e[j+1];
00221   complex double V[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00222   int d;
00223 
00224   generalizedeigensystem(H, N, j+1, thresh, e, V, &d);
00225 
00226   // we got d eigenstates, filter out the noise
00227 
00228   // sort eigenstates according to energy and norm
00229 
00230   // calculate norms
00231   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00232   multcmat(N, N, N2, j+1);
00233 
00234   double n, n2, norm[d];
00235   int i, k, l;
00236 
00237   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00238     n=0.0; n2=0.0;
00239     for (l=0; l<j+1; l++)
00240       for (k=0; k<j+1; k++) {
00241         n += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
00242         n2 += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N2[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
00243       }
00244     norm[i] = n2/n;
00245   }
00246 
00247   double maxnorm = 0.0;
00248   for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00249     maxnorm = fmax(maxnorm, creal(norm[i]));
00250 
00251   double mine = 0.0;
00252   for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00253     mine = fmin(mine, creal(e[i]));
00254 
00255   // merits
00256 
00257   struct merit {
00258     double val;
00259     int idx;
00260   } merits[d];
00261 
00262   // how should we sort the eigenstates ?
00263   // according to energy, according to overlap with intrinsic state ?
00264   // problematic as ordering may change during minimization
00265 
00266   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00267     merits[i].idx = i;
00268     if (creal(norm[i]) < Min.minnormkmix*maxnorm)
00269       merits[i].val = -100000.0;
00270     else
00271       merits[i].val = e[i]/mine + 0.1*norm[i]/maxnorm;
00272   }
00273 
00274   // sort according to merits value
00275   qsort(merits, d, sizeof(struct merit), cmpmerit);
00276 
00277   // now write good eigenvalues and eigenvectors into egood, Vgood
00278 
00279   i=0; while(i<d && merits[i].val > -100000.0) {
00280     egood[i] = e[merits[i].idx];
00281     for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00282       Vgood[k+i*(j+1)] = V[k+merits[i].idx*(j+1)];
00283     i++;
00284   }
00285   *ngood = i;
00286 
00287 }
00288

00291                    double* egood, complex double* Vgood, int* ngood)
00292 {
00293   complex double e[j+1];
00294   complex double V[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00295   int d;
00296 
00297   generalizedeigensystem(H, N, j+1, thresh, e, V, &d);
00298 
00299   // we got d eigenstates, filter out the noise
00300   // see sortEigenstates
00301 
00302   double norm[d];
00303   int i, k, l;
00304 
00305   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00306       norm[i] = 0.0;
00307       for (l=0; l<j+1; l++)
00308         for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00309           norm[i] += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
00310     }

00313   for (i=0; i<d; i++)

00319     double val;
00320     int idx;

00325     if (creal(norm[i]) < Min.minnormkmix*maxnorm)
00326       merits[i].val = -100000.0;
00327     else
00328       merits[i].val = -creal(e[i]);
00329   }

00331   // sort according to merits value
00332   qsort(merits, d, sizeof(struct merit), cmpmerit);
00333 
00334   // now write good eigenvalues and eigenvectors into egood, Vgood
00335

00346 
00347 #ifndef MPI
00348 void calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00349                                     const Interaction* Int,
00350                                     int j, int par, 
00351                                     angintegrationpara* angpara,
00352                                     complex double* H, complex double* N, complex double* J2)
00353 {
00354   SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00355   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00356 
00357   int nang = angpara->n;
00358 
00359   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00360 
00361   int k,kp;
00362   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00363     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00364       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00365       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00366       J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0;
00367     }
00368 
00369   complex double nme, hme, j2me;
00370   double alpha, beta, gamma, w;
00371 
00372   int i, ip;
00373   for (i=0; i<nang; i++) {
00374     copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);
00375 
00376     getangintegrationpoint(i, angpara, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);
00377 
00378     rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
00379     for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
00380       if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
00381       
00382       calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X);
00383       nme = X->ovlap;
00384       calcHamiltonianod(Int, Q, Qpp, X, &hme);
00385       calcConstraintJ2od(Q, Qpp, X, &j2me);
00386 
00387       for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00388         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00389           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00390             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*hme;
00391           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00392             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*nme;
00393           J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00394             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*j2me;
00395         }
00396     }
00397   }
00398 
00399 }
00400 #endif
00401 
00402 #ifdef MPI
00403 void calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00404                                     const Interaction* Int,
00405                                     int j, int par, 
00406                                     angintegrationpara* angpara,
00407                                     complex double* H, complex double* N, complex double* J2)
00408 {
00409   int nang = angpara->n;
00410 
00411   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00412 
00413   int k,kp;
00414   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00415     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00416       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00417       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00418       J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0;
00419     }
00420    
00421   int task = TASKHAMILTONIANOD;
00422   BroadcastTask(&task);
00423 
00424   BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00425   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00426 
00427   int todo = nang;
00428   int running=0;
00429   int done=0;
00430   int processor;
00431   MPI_Status status;
00432 
00433   // processor 0 is master
00434   double angle[mpisize][3];
00435   double weight[mpisize];
00436   double projpar[3];
00437   
00438   // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00439   int i;
00440   int working[mpisize];
00441   for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00442     working[i] = 0;
00443 
00444   complex double hme[2], nme[2], j2me[2];
00445 
00446   int next=0;
00447   while (done<todo) {
00448 
00449     if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {     // supply slaves with work
00450 
00451       // find empty slave
00452       for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00453         if (!working[i]) {
00454           processor = i;
00455           break;
00456         }
00457 
00458       getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00459 
00460       for (int a=0; a<3; a++)
00461         projpar[a] = angle[processor][a];
00462 
00463       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00464 
00465       working[processor] = 1;
00466       running++;
00467       next++;
00468 
00469     } else {                                    // collect results from slaves
00470 
00471       MPI_Recv(hme, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00472                MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGHAMILTONIANOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00473       processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00474 
00475       MPI_Recv(nme, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00476                processor, TAGOVLAPOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00477       MPI_Recv(j2me, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00478                processor, TAGANGULARMOMENTUMOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00479 
00480       complex double w;
00481       for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00482         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00483           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00484             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00485 
00486           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(hme[0] + par* hme[1]);
00487           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(nme[0] + par* nme[1]);
00488           J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(j2me[0] + par* j2me[1]);
00489         }
00490 
00491       working[processor] = 0;
00492       running--;
00493       done++;
00494     }
00495 
00496   }
00497 
00498   // tell slaves we have finished
00499   projpar[0] = -1.0;
00500   for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00501     MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00502   }     
00503 
00504 }
00505 #endif
00506 
00507 
00508 #ifndef MPI
00509 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00510                                         const Interaction* Int,
00511                                         int j, int par, 
00512                                         angintegrationpara* angpara,
00513                                         complex double* H, complex double* N,
00514                                         gradSlaterDet* dH, gradSlaterDet* dN)
00515 {
00516   SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00517   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00518   gradSlaterDet* dh = Work.dhproj;
00519   gradSlaterDet* dn = Work.dnproj;
00520   gradSlaterDetAux* dX = Work.dX;
00521 
00522   int nang = angpara->n;
00523 
00524   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00525 
00526   int k,kp;
00527   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00528     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00529       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00530       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00531       zerogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00532       zerogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00533     }
00534 
00535   double alpha, beta, gamma, w;
00536 
00537   int i, ip;
00538   for (i=0; i<nang; i++) {
00539     copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);
00540 
00541     getangintegrationpoint(i, angpara, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);
00542 
00543     rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
00544 
00545     for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
00546       if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
00547 
00548       calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X);
00549       calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X, dX);
00550       calcgradOvlapod(Q, Qpp, X, dX, dn);
00551       dn->val = X->ovlap;
00552       calcgradHamiltonianod(Int, Q, Qpp, X, dX, dh);
00553 
00554       for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00555         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00556 
00557           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00558             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*dh->val;
00559           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00560             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*dn->val;
00561 
00562           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/2*(ip ? par : +1)*
00563                                  (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma));
00564           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/2*(ip ? par : +1)*
00565                                  (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma));
00566         }
00567     }
00568   }
00569 
00570 }
00571 #endif
00572 
00573 #ifdef MPI
00574 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00575                                         const Interaction* Int,
00576                                         int j, int par, 
00577                                         angintegrationpara* angpara,
00578                                         complex double* H, complex double* N,
00579                                         gradSlaterDet* dH, gradSlaterDet* dN)
00580 {
00581   gradSlaterDet* dh = Work.dhproj;
00582   gradSlaterDet* dn = Work.dnproj;
00583 
00584   int nang = angpara->n;
00585 
00586   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00587 
00588   int k,kp;
00589   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00590     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00591       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00592       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00593       zerogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00594       zerogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00595     }
00596 
00597   int task = TASKGRADHAMILTONIANOD;
00598   BroadcastTask(&task);
00599 
00600   BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00601   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00602 
00603   int todo = nang;
00604   int running=0;
00605   int done=0;
00606   int processor;
00607   MPI_Status status;
00608 
00609   // processor 0 is master
00610   double angle[mpisize][3];
00611   double weight[mpisize];
00612   double projpar[3];
00613   
00614   // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00615   int i;
00616   int working[mpisize];
00617   for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00618     working[i] = 0;
00619 
00620 
00621   int next=0;
00622   while (done<todo) {
00623 
00624     if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {     // supply slaves with work
00625 
00626       // find empty slave
00627       for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00628         if (!working[i]) {
00629           processor = i;
00630           break;
00631         }
00632 
00633       getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00634       for (int k=0; k<3; k++)
00635         projpar[k] = angle[processor][k];
00636 
00637       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00638 
00639       working[processor] = 1;
00640       running++;
00641       next++;
00642 
00643     } else {                                    // collect results from slaves
00644 
00645       // wait for first value, identify slave, then recv all the other stuff from this slave
00646 
00647       complex double w;
00648 
00649       MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00650 
00651       processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00652 
00653       MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00654                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00655 
00656      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00657         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00658           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00659             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00660 
00661           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2* dh->val;
00662           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/2);
00663         }    
00664 
00665       MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00666       MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00667                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00668 
00669      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00670         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00671           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00672             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00673 
00674           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*par* dh->val;
00675           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/2*par);
00676         }    
00677 
00678       MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00679       MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00680                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00681 
00682      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00683         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00684           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00685             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00686 
00687           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2* dn->val;
00688           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/2);
00689         }        
00690 
00691       MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00692       MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00693                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00694 
00695      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00696         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00697           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00698             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00699 
00700           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*par* dn->val;
00701           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/2*par);
00702         }        
00703 
00704       working[processor] = 0;
00705       running--;
00706       done++;
00707     }
00708 
00709   }
00710 
00711   // tell slaves we have finished
00712   projpar[0] = -1.0;
00713   for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00714     MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00715   }     
00716 }
00717 #endif
00718 
00719 
00720 void initWork(int j, int par,
00721               angintegrationpara* AngPar,
00722               const Interaction* Int,
00723               const SlaterDet* Q)
00724 {       
00725   int k;
00726 
00727   Work.Qp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00728   Work.Qpp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00729   Work.X = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00730   Work.dX = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDetAux));
00731 
00732   initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qp);
00733   initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qpp);
00734   initSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.X);
00735   initgradSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.dX);
00736 
00737   Work.dH = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00738   Work.dN = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00739     
00740   for (k=0; k<(j+1)*(j+1); k++) {
00741     initgradSlaterDet(Q, &Work.dH[k]); 
00742     initgradSlaterDet(Q, &Work.dN[k]);
00743   }
00744 
00745   Work.dhintr = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00746   Work.dtcmintr = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00747   Work.dnintr = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00748   Work.dhproj = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00749   Work.dnproj = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00750 
00751   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dhintr);
00752   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dtcmintr);
00753   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dnintr);
00754   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dhproj);
00755   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dnproj);
00756 
00757   Work.V = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00758 
00759   Work.H = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00760   Work.N = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00761   Work.J2 = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00762 
00763 }
00764 
00765 // perform multiconfiguration calculation with fixed intrinsic states
00766 // return eigenvalue #ival
00767 
00768 // assumes fix matrix elements to be available in Work
00769 
00770 void calcprojectedHamiltonian(const SlaterDet* Q,
00771                               const Interaction* Int,
00772                               int j, int par,
00773                               int ival,
00774                               angintegrationpara* angpara,
00775                               double* eintr, double* eproj)
00776 {
00777   complex double* H = Work.H;
00778   complex double* N = Work.N;
00779   complex double* J2 = Work.J2;
00780   complex double* V = Work.V;
00781   int dim = Work.dim;
00782 
00783   // Q is intrinsic state to be varied
00784   // orient properly
00785   // then calculate needed matrix elements
00786   // solve eigenvalue problem in smaller subspace spanned by K-mixing eigenstates
00787 
00788   SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
00789   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00790 
00791 #ifdef ORIENTED
00792   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00793 #endif
00794    
00795   complex double hintr, tcmintr, nintr;
00796 
00797   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
00798 
00799 #ifdef ORIENTED
00800   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00801   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00802   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0))
00803     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00804   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
00805           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
00806   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
00807 #endif
00808 
00809   // intrinsic state
00810 
00811   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00812 
00813   if (isnan(X->ovlap)) {
00814     *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
00815     *eproj = ENERGYPENALTY;
00816     return;
00817   }
00818 
00819   nintr = X->ovlap;
00820   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
00821   calcTCMod(Qp, Qp, X, &tcmintr);
00822 
00823   // projected matrix elements for Qp
00824   calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, Qp, Int, j, par, angpara,
00825                                  H, N, J2);
00826 
00827   // K-mixing for Qp
00828   double ed[j+1];
00829 
00830   kmixingstates(H, N, j, Min.threshkmix, ed, V, &dim);
00831 
00832   if (!dim) {
00833     fprintf(stderr, "no good eigenstate for Q !\n");
00834   }
00835 
00836   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00837   multcmat(N, N, N2, j+1);
00838 
00839   complex double hproj[j+1], nproj[j+1], n2proj[j+1], j2proj[j+1];
00840 
00841   int i;
00842   for (i=0; i<dim; i++) {
00843     hproj[i] = expect(j+1, H, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00844     nproj[i] = expect(j+1, N, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00845     n2proj[i] = expect(j+1, N2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00846     j2proj[i] = expect(j+1, J2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00847   }
00848 
00849   for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00850     fprintf(stderr, "Q eigenstate %d: E = %8.3f MeV, n = %8.7f, J2 = %6.3f\n", i, 
00851             hbc*creal(hproj[i]/nproj[i]-tcmintr/nintr), creal(n2proj[i]/(nintr*nproj[i])), creal(j2proj[i]/nproj[i]));
00852 
00853   *eintr = (hintr-tcmintr)/nintr;
00854   *eproj = creal(hproj[ival]/nproj[ival]-tcmintr/nintr);
00855 }
00856 
00857 
00858 
00859 // gradients will be written to Work.dhintr, Work.dhproj
00860 
00861 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(const SlaterDet* Q, 
00862                                   const Interaction* Int,
00863                                   int j, int par, 
00864                                   int ival,
00865                                   angintegrationpara* angpara,
00866                                   double* eintr, double* eproj)
00867 {
00868   SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
00869   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00870   complex double* H = Work.H;
00871   complex double* N = Work.N;
00872   complex double* J2 = Work.J2;
00873   complex double* V = Work.V;
00874   int dim = Work.dim;
00875   gradSlaterDetAux* dX = Work.dX;
00876   gradSlaterDet* dH = Work.dH;
00877   gradSlaterDet* dN = Work.dN;
00878 
00879   gradSlaterDet* dhintr = Work.dhintr;
00880   gradSlaterDet* dtcmintr = Work.dtcmintr;
00881   gradSlaterDet* dnintr = Work.dnintr;
00882   gradSlaterDet* dhproj = Work.dhproj;
00883   gradSlaterDet* dnproj = Work.dnproj;
00884 
00885 #ifdef ORIENTED
00886   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00887 #endif
00888 
00889   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
00890 #ifdef ORIENTED
00891   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00892   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00893   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0)) {
00894     fprintf(stderr, "... angles inverted\n");
00895     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00896   }
00897   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
00898           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
00899   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
00900 
00901   lalpha0 = alpha0; lbeta0 = beta0; lgamma0 = gamma0;
00902 #endif
00903 
00904   complex double hintr, tcmintr, nintr;
00905   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00906   nintr = X->ovlap;
00907   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
00908   calcTCMod(Qp, Qp, X, &tcmintr);
00909 
00910   *eintr= creal((hintr-tcmintr)/nintr);
00911 
00912   // projected matrix elements for Qp
00913   calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, Qp, Int, j, par, angpara,
00914                                      H, N,
00915                                      dH, dN);
00916 
00917   // K-mixing for Qp
00918   double ed[j+1];
00919 
00920   kmixingstates(H, N, j, Min.threshkmix,
00921                 ed, V, &dim);
00922 
00923   if (!dim) {
00924     fprintf(stderr, "no good eigenstate for Q !\n");
00925   }
00926 
00927   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00928   multcmat(N, N, N2, j+1);
00929 
00930   complex double hproj[j+1], nproj[j+1], n2proj[j+1], j2proj[j+1];
00931 
00932   int i;
00933   for (i=0; i<dim; i++) {
00934     hproj[i] = expect(j+1, H, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00935     nproj[i] = expect(j+1, N, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00936     n2proj[i] = expect(j+1, N2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00937     j2proj[i] = expect(j+1, J2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00938   }
00939 
00940   for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00941     fprintf(stderr, "Q eigenstate %d: E = %8.3f MeV, n = %8.7f, J2 = %6.3f\n", i, 
00942             hbc*creal(hproj[i]/nproj[i]-tcmintr/nintr), creal(n2proj[i]/(nintr*nproj[i])), creal(j2proj[i]/nproj[i]));
00943 
00944   *eproj = creal(hproj[ival]/nproj[ival]-tcmintr/nintr);
00945 
00946   // gradients
00947 
00948   gradexpect(j+1, dH, &V[ival*(j+1)], dhproj);
00949   gradexpect(j+1, dN, &V[ival*(j+1)], dnproj);
00950 
00951   multgradSlaterDet(dhproj, 1.0/nproj[ival]);
00952   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dhproj, dnproj, -hproj[ival]/(nproj[ival]*nproj[ival]));
00953 
00954 #ifdef ORIENTED
00955   rotategradSlaterDet(dhproj, alpha0, beta0, gamma0);
00956 #endif
00957 
00958   // gradient from intrinsic energy
00959 
00960   calcSlaterDetAux(Q, X);
00961   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Q, X, dX);
00962   calcgradHamiltonian(Int, Q, X, dX, dhintr);
00963 
00964   // trap: calcgradTCM calculates gradient of -Tcm !
00965   zerogradSlaterDet(dtcmintr);
00966   calcgradTCM(Q, X, dX, dtcmintr);
00967 
00968   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dhproj, dtcmintr, +1.0);
00969   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dhintr, dtcmintr, +1.0);
00970 }                                 
00971 
00972 
00973 
00974 static void copyxtopara(const double* x, Para* q)
00975 {
00976   int i;
00977   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00978     q->x[i] = x[i];
00979 }
00980 
00981 
00982 void MinimizeDONLP2vapp(const Interaction* Int, 
00983                         int j, int par, int ival,
00984                         double threshkmix, double minnormkmix,
00985                         double alpha,
00986                         angintegrationpara* projpar,
00987                         const Constraint* Const, int nconst,
00988                         Parameterization* P, Para* q,
00989                         int maxsteps, int log, const char* logfile)
00990 {
00991 #ifndef MPI
00992   // handler for INT and TERM signals
00993   signal(SIGINT, catchterminate);
00994   signal(SIGTERM, catchterminate);
00995 #endif
00996 
00997   Min.maxsteps = maxsteps;
00998   Min.log = log;
00999   Min.logfile = logfile;
01000   Min.Int = Int;
01001   Min.j = j;
01002   Min.par = par;
01003   Min.ival = ival;
01004   Min.threshkmix = threshkmix;
01005   Min.minnormkmix = minnormkmix;
01006   Min.alpha = alpha;
01007   Min.projpar = projpar;
01008   Min.Const = Const;
01009   Min.nconst = nconst;
01010   Min.q = q;
01011   Min.P = P;
01012 
01013   Min.Q = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
01014   P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Q); 
01015 
01016 #ifndef MPI
01017   // regular program execution or catched signal ?
01018   if (!setjmp(env))
01019 #endif
01020     FORTRAN(donlp2)();
01021 
01022   fprintf(stderr, "donlp2 terminated because of criterium %d\n",
01023           (int) FORTRAN(o8itin).optite + 11);
01024 
01025   copyxtopara(FORTRAN(o8xdat).x, Min.q);
01026 }
01027 
01028 
01029 void FORTRAN(ef)(const double* x, double* fx)
01030 {
01031 #ifndef MPI
01032   if (sigterminate)
01033     longjmp(env, 1);
01034 #endif
01035 
01036   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01037   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01038 
01039   // nail to center-of-mass
01040   moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01041 
01042   double eintr, eproj;
01043 
01044   calcprojectedHamiltonian(Min.Q,
01045                            Min.Int,
01046                            Min.j, Min.par, Min.ival,
01047                            Min.projpar,
01048                            &eintr, &eproj);
01049 
01050   *fx = (eproj+Min.alpha*eintr);
01051   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icf++;
01052 
01053   fprintf(stderr, "\tme      E = % 8.3f MeV, Eproj = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV,\n", 
01054           hbc*(*fx), hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
01055 
01056 }
01057 
01058 
01059 void FORTRAN(egradf)(const double* x, double* gradf)
01060 {
01061 #ifndef MPI
01062   if (sigterminate)
01063     longjmp(env, 1);
01064 #endif
01065 
01066   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01067   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01068 
01069   // nail to center-of-mass
01070   moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01071 
01072   double eintr, eproj;
01073 
01074   calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(Min.Q,
01075                                Min.Int,
01076                                Min.j, Min.par, Min.ival, 
01077                                Min.projpar,
01078                                &eintr, &eproj);
01079 
01080   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Work.dhproj, Work.dhintr, Min.alpha);
01081 
01082   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Work.dhproj, gradf);
01083   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf++;
01084   fprintf(stderr, "grad %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV, Eproj = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
01085           FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*(eproj+Min.alpha*eintr), hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
01086 
01087 
01088   if (Min.log && !(FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf % Min.log)) {
01089     char logfname[255];
01090     sprintf(logfname, "%s.minvapp.%03d.log", Min.logfile, FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf);
01091     FILE* logfp;
01092     if (!(logfp = fopen(logfname, "w"))) {
01093       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", logfname);
01094     } else {
01095       fprintinfo(logfp);
01096       fprintf(logfp, "# step %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV, Eproj = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
01097               FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*(eproj+Min.alpha*eintr), hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
01098       fprintf(logfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
01099       fprintf(logfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", Min.P->name);
01100       Min.P->Parawrite(logfp, Min.q);
01101       fprintf(logfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
01102       writeSlaterDet(logfp, Min.Q);
01103       fclose(logfp);
01104     }
01105   }  
01106 
01107 }
01108 
01109 
01110 void FORTRAN(eg)(int* i, const double* x, double* gxi)
01111 {
01112   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
01113     *gxi = x[(*i-1)*NGAUSS+APOS]-MINIMUMA;
01114   }
01115 }
01116 
01117 
01118 void FORTRAN(egradg)(int* i, const double* x, double* gradgi)
01119 {
01120 }
01121 
01122 
01123 void FORTRAN(eh)(int* i, const double* x, double* hxi)
01124 {
01125 #ifndef MPI
01126   if (sigterminate)
01127     longjmp(env, 1);
01128 #endif
01129 
01130   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01131   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01132 
01133   if (*i > 1) {
01134     // nail to center-of-mass
01135     moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01136   }
01137 
01138   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01139   Min.Const[*i-1].me(Min.Q, Work.X, hxi);
01140 
01141   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tme   %4s = %8.3f\n", 
01142           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(*hxi));
01143 
01144   *hxi -= Min.Const[*i-1].val;
01145 }
01146 
01147 
01148 void FORTRAN(egradh)(int* i, const double* x, double* gradhi)
01149 {
01150 #ifndef MPI
01151   if (sigterminate)
01152     longjmp(env, 1);
01153 #endif
01154   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01155   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01156 
01157   if (*i > 1) {
01158     // nail to center-of-mass
01159     moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01160   }
01161 
01162   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01163   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX);
01164   zerogradSlaterDet(Work.dH);
01165   Min.Const[*i-1].gradme(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX, Work.dH);
01166 
01167   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Work.dH, gradhi);
01168   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tgrad %4s = %8.3f\n", 
01169           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(Work.dH->val));
01170 }
01171 
01172 
01173 void FORTRAN(setup0)(void)
01174 {
01175   int i;
01176 
01177   FORTRAN(o8dim).n = Min.q->n;
01178   FORTRAN(o8dim).nh = Min.nconst;
01179   // in case of FMD parametrization use bound constraints for Re{a}
01180   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
01181     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = Min.q->ngauss;
01182     for (i=0; i<Min.nconst+1; i++) {
01183       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][0] = -1;
01184       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][1] = 0;
01185       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][2] = 0;
01186     }
01187     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
01188       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][0] = 1;
01189       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][1] = i*NGAUSS+APOS+1;
01190       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][2] = 1;
01191     }
01192     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
01193       if (Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] < 0)
01194         Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] = 1.0+1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX;
01195     }
01196   } else
01197     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = 0;
01198   FORTRAN(o8stpa).analyt = 1;
01199   FORTRAN(o8stpa).cold = 1;
01200   FORTRAN(o8par).tau0 = 20.0;
01201   FORTRAN(o8par).del0 = 1.0;
01202   FORTRAN(o8rst).nreset = 20;
01203   FORTRAN(o8stpa).silent = 1;
01204 
01205   for (i=0; i<Min.q->n; i++)
01206     FORTRAN(o8xdat).x[i] = Min.q->x[i];
01207 }
01208

01210 void FORTRAN(setup)(void)
01211 {
01212   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te0 = 0;
01213   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te1 = 0;
01214   FORTRAN(o8par).iterma = Min.maxsteps-1;
